official_title: Enhancing Electronic Health Systems to Decrease the Burden of Colon Cancer, Lung Cancer, Obesity, Vaccine-Preventable Illness, and LivER Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
- Any patient who has a UC Davis or UC Irvine primary care provider (PCP) and is deficient in any of the following: colon cancer screening, lung cancer screening, tobacco cessation counseling, obesity counseling, pneumonia vaccination, shingles vaccine, and hepatitis C screening.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 50 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria: - Patients outside of the age limits or have an established PCP.
